channel.title: The Hot Wife Life
channel.description: Dedicated to the hot wife lifestyle! A sexy, married swinging MILF and her adorable husband talk about their hot wife experiences & share insight and stories.
channel.itunes:subtitle: What is it like to be a real-life hot-wife? Find out here.
channel.itunes:summary: THE hot wife lifestyle podcast, for couples, women, and, we never forget, single men.
channel.itunes:author: Rachel Devine

item.title: 27 - Insecurity or Bullshit?
item.dc:creator: thehotwifelife
item.description:
We hope March has your sex life roaring! Our isn’t too shabby either and we’re both really looking forward to the upcoming spring! We’re so happy to bring you a new episode where we talk about having “the talk” about becoming a hotwife couple and we analzye if a listener’s situation is about his insecurities or her bullshit.
If you have a question or request please reach us at thehotwifelifepodcast@gmail.com or thesouthernmilf@gmail.com.

Take advantage of these new benefits by becoming a Patron today ... and hear Rachel like you've never heard her before in the Patron exclusive for this episode. item.title: 25 - Having THE Talk
item.dc:creator: thehotwifelife
item.description:
Happy holidays to all our fans! We hope this festive season finds you well and that you’re surrounded by love, happiness and tons of dirty, dirty, sex!
In this last episode of 2016 we talk about the talk — those talks you have to have with your partner(s). It’s a lot of fun and we hope opening our lives like this will help many of you explore in your own way and open doors to lifestyle fun you’ve always wanted to enjoy.
item.content:encoded: Happy holidays to all our fans! We hope this festive season finds you well and that you're surrounded by love, happiness and tons of dirty, dirty, sex! In this last episode of 2016 we talk about the talk -- those talks you have to have with your partner(s). It's a lot of fun and we hope opening our lives like this will help many of you explore in your own way and open doors to lifestyle fun you've always wanted to enjoy. Patrons got 10% more content, including another private chat between just us and you. They'll also get to vote on a Poll coming out next month to determine what special you'd like from us. Right now we're thinking either audio sex tape from one of my adventures or a short story written by Keegan. They'll let us know when the Poll goes up (once we figure out how to build one) & then they'll be able to enjoy it, just like you could if you become a Patron at https://www.patreon.com/hotwifelife. We will be back in 2017, don't you worry. Thank you for all of your kind messages and notes and we hope we've brought you a year's worth of awesome content that you will enjoy for years to come. We'll see you in 2017! xoxoxxx, Rachel and Keegan

item.content:encoded:
Hi y'all! Happy Halloween! Well, almost!

We're back to talk about swinging couples experiencing a lull in their play. What it is. What is does. How to handle it. And how it isn't a bad thing.

We also give our Patrons 11 minutes of exclusive content that will never be publicly released. Do you want to become a Patron, to support the show and get benefits for doing so? You can! Just head over to www.patreon.com/thehotwifelife and select a level that you're comfortable with. Thank you for the amazing people who do help us keep bringing this show to the world for free. We're all creating a sex positive world with each and every episode!

Thank you to @HotWife937 of Twitter fame for such wonderful support ... again!

We love all of your for such wonderful support!!!

Thank you!!

xoxoxxx,

Rachel & Keegan

item.title: 21-The Craigslist Debacle and Hashtag Dickpic
item.dc:creator: thehotwifelife
item.description:
Warning, this episode will make you have a car accident, trip while you’re jogging, or disrupt the quiet cubicle life at work if you dare listen in those situations. We wanted a new adventure and decided to use Craigslist to help us. The results were … comedic. This is possibly the most fun we’ve ever had on this show; you will literally get to hear Keegan giggle at a few points!

Our lovely Patrons get 10 extra minutes of us right at the beginning–if you listen here and not on those public podcatchers.

A huge thank you to @candaforfun and @hotwife937 of Twitter for helping us spread the word about the show.
item.content:encoded:
Warning, this episode will make you have a car accident, trip while you're jogging, or disrupt the quiet cubicle life at work if you dare listen in those situations. We wanted a new adventure and decided to use Craigslist to help us. The results were ... comedic. This is possibly the most fun we've ever had on this show; you will literally get to hear Keegan giggle at a few points!
Our lovely Patrons get 10 extra minutes of us right at the beginning--if you listen here and not on those public podcatchers.
A huge thank you to @candaforfun and @hotwife937 of Twitter for helping us spread the word about the show.
Also, we mention we hit our $100/episode goal in this month's episodes but we've sadly lost one of our Patrons since then and have fallen short. But, no fear, we're still tucking away every penny so we can do this in our own studio some day. We would like to thank our Patrons for supporting us. If you'd like to support us and get more access to us, please consider becoming a Patron at (http://www.patreon.com/hotwifelife). I want to support this awesome show!
Please also leave us a rating on iTunes or wherever you listen. Thank you!
We hope you have as much fun listening to this as we had making it.
As always, play the game with no shame!
xoxoxxx, Rachel and Keegan

item.title: 20 - Program Update
item.dc:creator: thehotwifelife
item.description:
We hope you’re having an absolutely sexy summer! We are still here and still enjoying life and staying sexy and we hope you are too.

This is just a quick note to let you know that we’re still here. Summer time is crazy for us (like many of you, we imagine) with family responsibilities and vacations and fitting work in there somewhere and we haven’t been able to get the studio time when we need it. We have three amazing shows ready to record and we’ll do that as soon as we can, we promise.

In the meantime we just wanted to get this to you and thank you for your listenership! We’re absolutely humbled by all of you and your kindness and we can’t wait to ge [...]
item.content:encoded:
We hope you're having an absolutely sexy summer! We are still here and still enjoying life and staying sexy and we hope you are too.
This is just a quick note to let you know that we're still here. Summer time is crazy for us (like many of you, we imagine) with family responsibilities and vacations and fitting work in there somewhere and we haven't been able to get the studio time when we need it. We have three amazing shows ready to record and we'll do that as soon as we can, we promise.
In the meantime we just wanted to get this to you and thank you for your listenership! We're absolutely humbled by all of you and your kindness and we can't wait to get a few more episodes out for you to enjoy.
We're currently $1, away from reaching our first Patreon goal. If you love what we do, please consider supporting us at (https://www.patreon.com/hotwifelife)
Until you hear from us again, remember, there's no shame in how you play the game.
xoxoxxx,
Rachel and Keegan

item.title: 19 - Benefits Of Being A Hotwife
item.dc:creator: thehotwifelife
item.description:
We are releasing this episode a little early because we’ll be traveling next week and don’t want to make you wait until August to hear this episode.

In this episode, Rachel starts a football war, we discuss what and why Rachel and Keegan enjoy about the hot wife lifestyle, how to get caught having an affair and much, much more.

We thank all the new Patrons and those who have taken the time to rate & review us on iTunes and those on Twitter who retweet our requests during broadcasts and more!

Please rate and review us on iTunes and help us keep climbing their Top 200 list, which we’re constantly on now, thanks to all of you! You can go here to do that and help: https://itunes.apple. [...]
item.content:encoded:
We are releasing this episode a little early because we'll be traveling next week and don't want to make you wait until August to hear this episode.
In this episode, Rachel starts a football war, we discuss what and why Rachel and Keegan enjoy about the hot wife lifestyle, how to get caught having an affair and much, much more.
We thank all the new Patrons and those who have taken the time to rate & review us on iTunes and those on Twitter who retweet our requests during broadcasts and more!
Please rate and review us on iTunes and help us keep climbing their Top 200 list, which we're constantly on now, thanks to all of you! You can go here to do that and help: https://itunes.apple.com/tr/podcast/the-hot-wife-life/id980891117?mt=2
With our vacation it will be a little while until you hear from us again but, wow, when you do you are going to love what we're going to have for you. Be prepared to cry, shake your head and laugh your ass off! For $10 and more Patrons, we are going to try to sneak away from family and Periscope at some point during our vacation. Make sure you listen to the introduction in the PATRON version of the show so you know how Rachel can reach you.
If you want to support us and get exclusive access to Rachel, become a Patron today by going to https://www.patreon.com/hotwifelife and signing up to donate. We couldn't do this show and keep bringing it for free without our Patrons. They're awesome and we should all be grateful to them! Rachel and Keegan sure are.
Become a Patron today
Thank you for all of your amazing support! We love you all!
xoxoxxx, Rachel and Keegan

item.title: 18 - What Is Kink?
item.dc:creator: thehotwifelife
item.description:
An episode about kink!!! This episode we talk about kink. What it is. How we’ve seen those in the lifestyle deal with it. And we talk about how it impacts the hotwife life & acceptance.

We also share a NEW benefit of being a Patron in addition to the special things you already enjoy! And it has to do with Periscope, so be sure to listen for that. And there is also more Patron content coming in the future, that we’re working on right now. We can’t wait to share it with you.

If you would like to support the show, become a Patron and get awesome access and [...]
item.content:encoded:
An episode about kink!!! This episode we talk about kink. What it is. How we've seen those in the lifestyle deal with it. And we talk about how it impacts the hotwife life & acceptance.
We also share a NEW benefit of being a Patron in addition to the special things you already enjoy! And it has to do with Periscope, so be sure to listen for that. And there is also more Patron content coming in the future, that we're working on right now. We can't wait to share it with you.
If you would like to support the show, become a Patron and get awesome access and benefits in return. Just go to https://www.patreon.com/hotwifelife today to make a recurring pledge that you control. It's completely anonymous (if you make it so) and you can get access to Rachel and Keegan on a totally different level. If you cannot become a Patron, we also have a PayPal button on the page, where you can make a one time donation.
And we LOVE getting iTunes ratings and reviews. We dream of the day a hotwife podcast is #1 in iTunes 'sexuality' category and you can make that happen by going to https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/the-hot-wife-life/id980891117?mt=2 and leaving us a 5-star rating and, for those truly wonderful people who have a few minutes to spare, a review. Even a couple of nice words will make a HUGE difference in iTunes helping us be found.
Thank you to everyone who downloads and listens and, especially, supports this show so we can keep it free.
xoxoxxx, Rachel & Keegan

item.title: 17 - First Threesome With 2 Guys
item.dc:creator: thehotwifelife
item.description:
The long awaited story about the first time I slept with 2 guys and Keegan wasn’t involved, well, in an active way.

You, our dear listeners, asked for a story, so we decided to start off with this one.

Patrons also get a special bonus this episode, a picture of the actual event. It’s our way of saying ‘thank you’ for your support of the show that helps us keep bringing it to everyone for free. The best way you can help the show is by becoming a Patron to help us grow and get our own equipment so we can record more often.

If you appreciate what we do, you can also help the show in another way, even if you cannot Patron. You can also leave us a ratin [...]
item.content:encoded:
The long awaited story about the first time I slept with 2 guys and Keegan wasn't involved, well, in an active way.
You, our dear listeners, asked for a story, so we decided to start off with this one.
Patrons also get a special bonus this episode, a picture of the actual event. It's our way of saying 'thank you' for your support of the show that helps us keep bringing it to everyone for free. The best way you can help the show is by becoming a Patron to help us grow and get our own equipment so we can record more often.
If you appreciate what we do, you can also help the show in another way, even if you cannot Patron. You can also leave us a rating and review on iTunes. All 5-star ratings and reviews help push us up in the iTunes charts so other people who would enjoy a show expressly dedicated to the hotwife lifestyle can find us. Please go over to https://itunes.apple.com/tr/podcast/the-hot-wife-life/id980891117?mt=2 today and rate us with love.
We are sorry it's taken a month to get this to you but getting into this recording space is difficult. You are helping us get closer to getting the last bits of equipment we need to pull this off at home. Patrons of the show are making that more and more possible with each episode donation.
Enjoy the episode and we'll see you in July! Play with no shame!
xoxoxoxxx, Rachel & Keegan
item.itunes:subtitle: The long awaited story about the first time I slept with 2 guys and Keegan wasn't involved, well, in an active way. You, our dear listeners, ...
item.itunes:summary:
The long awaited story about the first time I slept with 2 guys and Keegan wasn't involved, well, in an active way.


You, our dear listeners, asked for a story, so we decided to start off with this one.


Patrons also get a special bonus this episode, a picture of the actual event. It's our way of saying 'thank you' for your support of the show that helps us keep bringing it to everyone for free. The best way you can help the show is by becoming a Patron to help us grow and get our own equipment so we can record more often.


If you appreciate what we do, you can also help the show in another way, even if you cannot Patron. You can also leave us a rating and review on iTunes. All 5-star ratings and reviews help push us up in the iTunes charts so other people who would enjoy a show expressly dedicated to the hotwife lifestyle can find us. Please go over to https://itunes.apple.com/tr/podcast/the-hot-wife-life/id980891117?mt=2 today and rate us with love.


We are sorry it's taken a month to get this to you but getting into this recording space is difficult. You are helping us get closer to getting the last bits of equipment we need to pull this off at home. Patrons of the show are making that more and more possible with each episode donation.


Enjoy the episode and we'll see you in July! Play with no shame!


xoxoxoxxx,

Rachel & Keegan
item.itunes:author: Rachel Devine

item.title: 16 - Budding Hot Wives
item.dc:creator: thehotwifelife
item.description:
Rachel and Keegan discuss the fallout of telling someone that we’re swingers. Thank you Chippy!

J & K wanted to know about resources for couples who are interested in the hot wife life and tactics to just starting out.

Hotwife937 asks about Rachel’s instant messaging/social media use.

We would like to thank the following Twitter followers for taking us up on our Twitter challenge and Retweeting our episodes. It’s because of followers/listeners like you that we have such a supportive community. Thank you all so much. Now, special love to: @michaelpinksto1, @DanBrr70, @Rahulesh8Singh and @sizzlinghotmilf.

item.title: 14 - Weeding Out The Assholes
item.dc:creator: thehotwifelife
item.description:
One of the most-asked questions we’ve received throughout our years in the hot wife lifestyle is “how do you weed out the assholes?”

In this episode we talk about exactly that!

A huge digital hug and kiss to Hopper for the wonderful topic. Both Keegan and I wish you nothing but fun and body-shaking adventures!

Our Patrons are helping us slowly acquire our own equipment so we can set up a studio at home. If you would like to help us do that (so we can do more episodes, more consistently) please consider becoming a Patron. You’ll also get exclusive content from u [...]
item.content:encoded:
One of the most-asked questions we've received throughout our years in the hot wife lifestyle is "how do you weed out the assholes?"
In this episode we talk about exactly that!
A huge digital hug and kiss to Hopper for the wonderful topic. Both Keegan and I wish you nothing but fun and body-shaking adventures!
Our Patrons are helping us slowly acquire our own equipment so we can set up a studio at home. If you would like to help us do that (so we can do more episodes, more consistently) please consider becoming a Patron. You'll also get exclusive content from us!
We hope you enjoy this episode!
xoxoxoxoxoxo, Rachel and Keegan

item.title: 13 - Raw Confessions
item.dc:creator: thehotwifelife
item.description: We bring you a special episode this time. All the stars and moons aligned as I got to meet a guy on the same day we planned to record. What you get to hear in this episode is Keegan and I talking through the experience of meeting a potential Dom playmate. It has always been my desire to help other women, other couples, who are interested in the “hot wife” lifestyle and we think this episode is a great example of how we talk about guys, us, and sex. We also talk some safety tips & how to get me drunk.
item.content:encoded:
We bring you a special episode this time. All the stars and moons aligned as I got to meet a guy on the same day we planned to record. What you get to hear in this episode is Keegan and I talking through the experience of meeting a potential Dom playmate. It has always been my desire to help other women, other couples, who are interested in the "hot wife" lifestyle and we think this episode is a great example of how we talk about guys, us, and sex. We also talk some safety tips & how to get me drunk.


Also, we broke into the Top 100 of the 'Sexuality' category on iTunes!!! We haven't released an episode in a month because we don't have our own recording space (you can help us change that by becoming a Patron) so we've dropped out since then, but it was a nice few days to see us that high. You get exclusive content and you get it commercial-free and early. Thank you for all of your emails and suggestions! We'll be getting to those as quickly as we can.


xoxoxo,

Rachel & Keegan


Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/hotwifelife

item.title: 12 - Finding Your Own Feet
item.dc:creator: thehotwifelife
item.description:
We’re in the Top 200 on iTunes thanks to the wonderful support and interest from the community! You all know how to make a girl feel special.

In this episode we explore so many things about the evolution of our swinging and we get into a listener letter and celebrate their journey!

We have advice for thinkers and Stamina Kings as well.

And we talk about how being a Hot Wife is actually a life STYLE.

We're in the Top 200 on iTunes thanks to the wonderful support and interest from the community! You all know how to make a girl feel special.
In this episode we explore so many things about the evolution of our swinging and we get into a listener letter and celebrate their journey!
We have advice for thinkers and Stamina Kings as well.
And we talk about how being a Hot Wife is actually a life STYLE.
Patrons get bonus content and bloopers :) How can you become a Patron? Go on over to https://www.patreon.com/hotwifelife and sign up for what you're comfortable with. All of your support is appreciated.
Thank you again for supporting this show like you do! I hope you enjoy your exclusives & remember, Patreon has an app now so you don't have to stream off the site anymore!
xoxoxoxoxoRachel

We also talk about how past experiences can screw up current play, sky-diving and polar bear plunges and bareback.

Guys, you’re even given a homework assignment for the first time ever.

Want to have more access to me? Want to h [...]
item.content:encoded:
This was a fun followup to last episode with Mr. TSM. Do you really want your partner to get into swinging? Good! Everyone should, in our opinion. :) We help you understand just how you can do that.
We also talk about how past experiences can screw up current play, sky-diving and polar bear plunges and bareback.
Guys, you're even given a homework assignment for the first time ever.
Want to have more access to me? Want to help me improve the show and spend more time with you? Please consider becoming a Patron! Every donation helps and you get something from me too!
xoxoxoxoxoRachel

item.title: 10-Meet Mr TSM
item.dc:creator: thehotwifelife
item.description:
You asked for it and you got it, Mr. TSM joins me in this episode!

In response to overwhelming interest to hear his perspective, I brought him on the show and we had a great chat about his introduction to swinging, a turning point in our swinging, the role of porn and communicating through fantasies.

As financial supporters of the show get extras in this episode. They’ll get better as we learn what we’re doing but, hey, we all start somewhere, right?
